generatedTitle: "Jennifer Hudson: From American Idol to Entertainment Superstar"

extractFactDictList.question: When was Jennifer Hudson born?
extractFactDictList.sentence: She was born on August 12, 1979, in Chicago, Illinois, USA.

extractFactDictList.sentence: She released her debut album, 'Jennifer Hudson,' in 2008, which debuted at number two on the Billboard 200 chart and was certified gold by the RIAA.
